name: Mr. Bunny
description:
Mr. Bunny embarks on fantastic adventures with the goal of finding his lost glasses. Mr.Bunny's vision diminishes as time goes by and he does not lose it altogether, he needs to pick up the carrots he meets along the way, facing various challenges like his number one enemy - the fox, and obstacles he encounters in the route.

Made with love by, 

Francisco Regalado

Sónia Machado
